summary: AN ORDINANCE authorizing an agreement with The Friends fo the Conservatory for financial assistance and voluntary support for Volunteer Park conservatory purposes, the conduct of educational programs and the use of conservatory and greenhouse space; establishing a Conservatory Subaccount in the Park and Recreation Fund and a Conservatory Capital Account in the General Gift and Donation Fund; and authorizing the acceptance of gifts and donations for conservatory purposes and implementing ot the agreement.
